ValidationRule.description: Forces Operator Assisted Audio to be selected as Audio Type when Premium and InterCall are selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "InterCall"), ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Premium"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Audio")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: InterCall Premium events can only be marked as Operator Assisted. Please update the Audio Type to Operator Assisted Audio and try saving the record again.
